message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $100. I think it's a great deal for something of this quality. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $100 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $70. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $100 is my ideal price, I could come down to $90. I'm confident you won't find this value anywhere else.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $75 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?
